entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 02:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
